name: 李老师不是你老师
content: From May 21st to 28th, the property management company of the Arc de Triomphe community in Taiyuan, Shanxi Province, owed wages to cleaning staff, and the workers held up banners demanding their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 29, the cleaning staff of Shenyang Metro launched a strike to defend their rights. A worker who participated in the rights defense revealed that Shenyang Metro "changed from a state-owned enterprise to a private enterprise" and the company changed employee contracts without prior notice. "Insurance used to be paid to the age of 55 , now the payment is until the age of 50, and the payment is the new rural cooperative medical system, no rest on holidays, no three salaries, no rest during the New Year." The employees' demand is to maintain the previous labor contract. In addition, employees also revealed that the subway cleaning staff’s

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As the 35th anniversary of June 4th approaches, we collaborate with Human Rights in China @hrichina and Humanitarian China @HChina89 to release a series of special photos of June 4th. Scene of the 1989 Democracy Movement No. 17 (May 29)
[The Central Academy of Fine Arts casts the goddess of democracy] [Tiananmen Square transforms into a tent city]

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Xingtai, Hebei, a lawyer interviewed the owner of the unfinished building of Yongkang Shijia. The owner said that he bought the house for his wedding, but now the house is unfinished and he has not been able to move into the wedding house. He is still paying off the loan. The owner said that unfinished buildings in Xingtai are common and he is disappointed with the local officials.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of May 28, in Nantong, Jiangsu, the owners of Sujian Garden City protested against the new property management company in the community and demanded that the new property management company leave. They also shouted slogans such as "Hongyang get out! Hongyang get out!" During the protest, the owners even knelt down and begged the new property management company to leave.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some netizens saw "grid inspection test papers" posted in the carriages of the Shenzhen Metro. The papers are used to test the reaction time of staff to unknown stickers or slogans that appear randomly in the carriages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Although the Ministry of Public Security requires the hotel industry not to refuse to receive foreign personnel, practitioners in Gansu said that they have still received notices not to receive foreign personnel privately, and they are required to report on Uyghurs and lamas staying at their hotels.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of May 29, security guards at Fuzhou University of Technology snatched takeaway food from students and gave them the middle finger, causing agitation and dissatisfaction among students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/DclTlHSJQB

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 30, in Jiujiang, Jiangxi, a woman posted a video saying that her two-year-old daughter was picked up by an underage girl and thrown from the 17th floor while she was playing downstairs in Sunshine International Community. The police said that the other party was a minor and all information would not be disclosed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 30, Tangshan, Hebei, strong winds caused damage to the roof of Tangshan Station

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 29, Zhengzhou, Henan. Some parents reported that Huanancheng No. 1 Primary School gave students moldy vegetables to eat. When parents accompanied their children to eat at school, the school also hid the rotten vegetables and only replaced the public chopsticks once every six months.
School announcement: Set up a canteen supervision group, give a warning to the canteen safety officer, and fine 6,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 30, Beijing. Affected by strong winds, several outdoor workers on CCTV's "Big Pants" were blown off the wall and swayed in the wind.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 27, a Taiyuan netizen posted that his friend was laid off and had no job, his parents had both passed away, he had no family, and he couldn't even afford to eat. He asked him to borrow 100 yuan, and he could only transfer the only 44 yuan he had to him. He sighed, "This is the life of ordinary people in Taiyuan." As of now, the post can no longer be found.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a woman in Henan Province posted a video sharing the harvest of her 12 mu wheat field in one quarter. The woman said that after deducting the various costs of growing wheat, the net profit of the 12 mu wheat field was 5,582 yuan. Her father said, "It's not even as much as other people make in a month."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, night inspections of electric bicycles have been carried out nationwide. According to reports, on the 23rd, a total of 74,000 night inspection teams were formed nationwide, 256,000 law enforcement officers were mobilized, and 298,000 electric bicycles that were illegally parked and charged were persuaded to move away. Among them, Zhejiang Province cleared more than 30,000 illegally parked electric bicycles on the 23rd.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/9XXc5m4NW9

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 30, it was reported online that the student was given a severe warning by Chongqing University of Posts and Telecommunications for posting a video "complaining about the morning exercise culture on American campuses."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/6A1idjgUvj

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Just now, the local police issued a police report

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 29, the State Council released the "2023 Report on Human Rights Violations in the United States", which triggered ridicule from netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 28, a truck driver said that 30 cartons of Yili milk were slightly damaged during transportation. He was asked to pay 2,095 yuan in compensation. In the end, the truck driver was only allowed to take three cartons. Yili responded that this was a company regulation, and milk with damaged packaging would be destroyed and not sold. However, some netizens said that if the milk purchased on Yili's online store was damaged, it could not be used as a reason for after-sales compensation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the central inspection team entered Tangshan, a large number of petitioners gathered outside the hotel where the inspection team was staying to seek justice. In the video, plainclothes officers were constantly intercepting petitioners.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 27, Xi Jinping proposed to speed up the construction of China's employment theory system and effectively enhance my country's international voice and influence in the employment field.
What do you think?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 28, Zhaotong, Yunnan. Fifteen years after the demolition of the Doe Deer Community, the resettlement of residents has not been resolved. Residents went to the construction site to seek an explanation but were beaten with sticks by the staff on site. Some people were injured in the conflict.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/f1k9lEFgNB

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 30, in Puyang, Henan, the delivery of Country Garden Lingyu real estate was delayed, and the owners went to the sales office and the petition office to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 30, Yunnan. The Dali branch of Huasheng Engineering Construction Company owed workers wages, and workers held up banners to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 30, Luan County, Hebei. Yingfa Ranch rented cows from villagers in Fanzhuang Village, but the cows died due to poor management. The villagers knelt down to the ranch manager and demanded compensation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 29, Handan, Hebei. The Ideal City real estate project has been unfinished for eight years, and the owners knelt outside the city government to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 30, Nanjing, Jiangsu. Elderly people blocked the entrance of Huijing Heyuan Community to resist forced demolition.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As the 35th anniversary of June 4th approaches, we collaborate with Human Rights in China @hrichina and Humanitarian China @HChina89 to release a series of special photos of June 4th. Scene of the 1989 Democracy Movement No. 18 (May 30)
[The Statue of the Goddess of Democracy becomes a star in the square] [Students put forward four conditions to resume dialogue]

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to online reports, on May 28, in Changzhou, Jiangsu, a man stopped a car and then slit his throat in front of the car.
